description.lang: > Manual and remote ON/OFF control of connected loads> LED Display options control the length of time they remain lit> Push pad always returns to a neutral position whether switch is on or off so it maintains a consistent appearance when mixed in a multi-switch wall box> Compatible with Decora Plus screwless wallplates and Decora wallplates> Requires the Vizia RF + Handheld Remote - VRCPG for programming and control of the Vizia RF + System (sold separately)
